SEASON_SPECIFIC_DESCRIPTION: Missing items specific to this season
SEASON_SPECIFIC_CC_DESCRIPTION: Missing Community Center items specific to this season
COMMON_CC_DESCRIPTION: Missing Community Center items common to all seasons
SPECIFIC_MERCHANT_DESCRIPTION: Missing seasonal items that are available from the Travelling Cart
CCMERCHANT_DESCRIPTION: Missing Community Center items that are available from the Travelling Cart
COOKED_ITEMS_DESCRIPTION: Missing cooked items that you know how to make
FISH_TAB_DESCRIPTION: All of the fish that can be obtained
CROPS_TAB_DESCRIPTION: All of the crops from all of the seasons (even if you haven't unlocked the seeds yet)
EMPTY_LIST_MESSAGE: There is nothing you are missing that is available
OBTAINED_FROM_CRAB_POT_IN_OCEAN: Obtained from a crab pot in the ocean
OBTAINED_FROM_CRAB_POT_IN_FRESHWATER: Obtained from a crab pot in freshwater
LEGEND_INFO: In spring, fish close to the giant log in the Mountain Lake when its raining. Requires fishing lvl 10.
GLACIERFISH_INFO: In winter, fish at the southern most point of the island just above the hat mouse. Requires fishing lvl 6.
CRIMSONFISH_INFO: In summer, fish at the second Beach Pier. Requires fishing lvl 5.
ANGLER_INFO: In fall, fish upwards on the small bridge near JoJo Mart. Requires fishing lvl 3.
MUTANT_CARP_INFO: In any season, fish in the Sewers (in the open room with Krobus)
STONEFISH_INFO: Found in the Mines on floor 20
ICE_PIP_INFO: Found in the Mines on floor 60
LAVA_EEL_INFO: Found in the Mines on floor 100
